    • 构造器详细资料

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(java.lang.String url)
        Instantiates a new Url source. use default protocol HTTP, use default format SOURCE_FMT_MP4. use default cache policy CACHE_POLICY_WHOLE_FILE_CONTENT

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(java.lang.String url,
                  int proto)
        Instantiates a new Url source. use default protocol HTTP, use default format SOURCE_FMT_MP4. use default cache policy CACHE_POLICY_WHOLE_FILE_CONTENT
        参数:
        url - the url
        proto - the proto

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(java.lang.String url,
                  int proto,
                  int format,
                  int cachePolicy)
        Instantiates a new Url source.
        参数:
        url - the url
        proto - the proto
        format - data source format, may be SOURCE_FMT_MP4 or SOURCE_FMT_FLV.
        cachePolicy - cache policy for url, may be CACHE_POLICY_WHOLE_FILE_CONTENT, CACHE_POLICY_STREAM_LATEST_GOP, CACHE_POLICY_NOCACHE

      • DataSource

        public DataSource(java.lang.String url,
                  int proto,

                  int cachePolicy,
                  boolean isLiveMode)
